Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' across all cases
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of cases where 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' is immediately followed by 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' in variants that eventually lead to 'SW-EIC Accept'
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-EIC Accept' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants starting with 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' compared to those starting with 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' in cases that include the activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'SW-Reviewer Agreed' occurs

Name: Ratio of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' to 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation' across the entire log
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Revised Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that also contain at least one occurrence of 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'SW-Reviewer Agreed'

Name: Fraction of variants where 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' appears more than once (indicating possible resubmissions or system reprocessing)
Metric: the average of the function base > 1 where base is the number of times `ACTIVITY` == 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' occurring before plagiarism checks (e.g., 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed') versus after
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' in comparison to the total number of manuscript export events ('Manuscript Export Succeeded')
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities for cases where activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that occur before any reviewer-related activity (e.g., 'SW-Reviewer Agreed', 'SW-Reviewer Declined', 'SW-Reviewer No Response')
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that are part of variants resulting in a final decision (e.g., 'SW-EIC Accept', 'SW-EIC Reject', 'SW-EIC Major Revision', 'SW-EIC Minor Revision', 'SW-EIC Reject & Resubmit')
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' per month to identify submission trends in the ACM journal review process
Metric: Number of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' that are not followed by any checklist-related activity (e.g., 'SW-Checklist Completed', 'SW-Checklist Completion is due in three days')
Metric: Percentage of 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation' out of all cases
